title: Workshop on Learning Design and TPACK Framework-Based Technology-Enhanced Instructional Design for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of foundational educational theories and general teaching experience
context.additional_context: A program for pre-service teachers focused on strengthening language education job competencies within corporate settings

learning_goals: Through collaborative design activities, learners can apply the seven core elements of the TPACK framework (technology, content, pedagogy, and four integration domains) to actual lesson design.
Learners can develop technology-enhanced lesson designs that are effective even in limited technological environments (primarily smartphone-based).
The iterative design process incorporating peer feedback can improve learning designs that integrate TPACK elements

resources: Online Collaboration Tools (Google Docs, Padlet, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
